aphid_high_humidity.description: High humidity & NDVI drop suggests aphids
aphid_high_humidity.recommendation: Inspect field and apply neem spray

whitefly_high_temp.description: High temperature with moderate humidity suggests whitefly
whitefly_high_temp.recommendation: Monitor leaf undersides and apply appropriate pesticide

bollworm_ndvi_drop.description: Significant NDVI drop indicates possible bollworm damage
bollworm_ndvi_drop.recommendation: Check for bollworm larvae and apply targeted treatment

significant_ndvi_change.description: Significant NDVI change (positive or negative) indicates stress
significant_ndvi_change.recommendation: Investigate cause of significant NDVI change - could indicate pest, disease, or environmental stress
